message.entry: Noise type must be a string or character vector.
Too many input arguments for ''poisson'' noise.
For ''poisson'' noise, images of data type int16 are not supported.
For ''gaussian'' noise, the mean must be a real scalar.
For ''{0}'' noise, the variance must be a real, nonnegative scalar.
For ''salt & pepper'' noise, the noise density must be a scalar between 0 and 1, inclusive.
Too many input arguments for ''salt & pepper'' noise.
Too many input arguments for ''speckle'' noise.
Too few input arguments for ''localvar'' noise.
For ''localvar'' noise, the noise variance must be a nonnegative real matrix of the same size as the image.
For ''localvar'' noise, the image intensity map must be a vector with values between 0 and 1, inclusive.
For ''localvar'' noise, when you specify an image intensity map, the noise variance must be a nonnegative real vector.
For ''localvar'' noise, the image intensity map and the noise variance must be vectors of the same length.
Too many input arguments for ''localvar'' noise.
